title: ToToM - Bootleg is Resistance Vol. I/III (around NIN) [FLAC]
description:
ToToM
Bootleg is Resistance, volume I/III
2008

This album is the first volume out of the Bootleg is Resistance trilogy, this is a triple mashup album made around songs by Nine Inch Nails from the album Year Zero, which are mixed up with completely stranger songs. This first volume features mashups (or bootlegs, whatever you call them) where you can hear Trent Reznor sing over other artists&#039; songs.


01. Hypercloser (Nine Inch Nails - Closer vs. HYPERPOWER!) 1:39
02. The Mammooth of the End (The Beginning of the End vs. Interpol - Mammooth) 4:29
03. Survive the Casbah (Survivalism vs. The Clash - Rock the Casbah) 5:05
04. The Good Soldier&#039;s Closer Warning (The Good Soldier & The Warning vs. NIN - Closer) 6:37
05. Close to Vessel (Vessel vs. The Cure - Close to me [closer remix]) 4:33
06. Me I&#039;m not Easy (Me, I&#039;m not vs. The Commodores - Easy) 4:21
07. Capital of the ÃƒÆ’?nema Empire (Capital G vs. Kasabian - Empire & Tool - ÃƒÆ’?nema) 4:14
08. 1 2 3 4 My Violent Heart (My Violent Heart vs. Feist - 1 2 3 4) 3:14
09. The Warning of Love (The Warning vs. Burt Bacharach - The Look of Love) 2:58
10. Fade to God (God Given vs. Visage - Fade to Grey [DreamTime remix]) 4:46
11. Get Down Make Love to your Master (Meet your Master vs. Queen - Get Down Make Love) 3:54
12. I Wanna Get: Greater / Good / High (The Greater Good vs. Cypress Hill - I Wanna Get High) 3:20
13. The Down Boy Destroyer (The Great Destroyer vs. Yeah Yeah Yeahs - Down Boy) 3:19
14. Another Medley of the Truth (samples from every YZ track vs. Another Version of the Truth) 4:10
15. Twilight DJ (In this Twilight vs. David Bowie - DJ) 4:38
16. Tear Zero (Massive Attack - Teardrop vs. Zero Sum) 5:46


all songs originally written by Trent Reznor and the artists as mentioned.
every track produced by ToToM
artwork & logo by Jbaal
